CustomField.formula: TRIM( TEXT(Bank_Preference_1__c) & IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Bank_Preference_1__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Bank_Preference_2__c))) ), ', ', '' ) & TEXT(Bank_Preference_2__c) & IF( AND( OR( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Bank_Preference_1__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Bank_Preference_2__c))) ), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Bank_Preference_3__c))) ), ', ', '' ) & TEXT(Bank_Preference_3__c) )
CustomField.label: Banking Preference for Loan
